blog.title: king explosion murder
blog.description: gray // requests are open (inbox: 3) // masterlist

summary: Can I have 31 with Denki please? I'm so excited to see what you write!!^^ Much love♡♡♡♡!
question: Can I have 31 with Denki please? I'm so excited to see what you write!!^^ Much love♡♡♡♡!
answer:
ofc~ sorry i didn’t see these last night! i kept checking my notifs and got sad no one was requesting anything and went to sleep

…

  in retrospect, playing seven minutes in heaven with all but two of your classmates seemed like a great idea. you didn’t see the harm in it, so you joined in midgame after training. but, now, as you walked towards the room with kaminari denki at your heels and ashido leading you, you felt your heart race more than it did when the villains were attacking at usj.

  kaminari had been a longtime crush of yours, since the entrance exam. and you were going to be locked in a dark room with him for a whole seven minutes. how were you supposed to stay calm?!

  “oh, i can’t see anything,” you mumbled, stumbling blindly into the room, kaminari following suit and ashido announcing the seven minutes have begun. you put your arms in front of you, but your foot caught on something and you squeaked.

  arms circled around your waist and caught you just before you could fall. “careful,” kaminari laughed.

  your cheeks bloomed into a blush. “s-sorry.”

  “don’t worry about it,” you could hear the grin in his voice.

  he still had one arm around your waist, and you felt jitters crawling under your skin. “uh, so… so what are we supposed to do?” the darkness was slowly getting easier to see in, your eyes adjusting to the dark finally.

  “not sure,” the blond said. “i think todoroki and yaomomo just talked the whole time.”

  “oh,” you mumbled. “s-so i guess there’s no pressure.”

  but you knew there was. somehow, somehow, you knew ashido was behind all of this. she’d known of your crush on kaminari for months, always telling you to grow a pair of tits and confess to him already, that your quiet crush on the electric boy was getting depressing.

  “h-hey, denki-kun?”

  the blond hummed.

  “i… i guess since we’re alone in here, um, i just wanted to say, uh, i wanted to say… fuck,” you swore under your breath. “uh, just wanted to say that i like you, and it’s probably going to get awkward for the next few minutes we’re locked in here because i’m not sure if you feel the same way or–”

  a hand touched your cheek, and you jumped. “easy, it’s just me, (name).”

  “ri-right, no one else is, uh, is in here,” you breathed.

  kaminari laughed. “can i kiss you?”

  “y-you? kiss me? uh, yeah, yes, please, uhm–”

  smooth lips pressed against your own, and you felt yourself take a subconscious step closer to kaminari. one hand on your waist, the other on your cheek, you weren’t sure where to place your own. but that didn’t really matter at the moment–kaminari denki was kissing you.

  kaminari was the one to break from the kiss first, and you could see the hint of a smile on his lips in the dark room. “you have no idea how long i’ve waited to do that.”

  you blushed. “s-same.”

  “can i kiss you again?”

  you laughed quietly. “yeah,” you mumbled, one hand pulling him closer from the back of his neck, your lips connecting once more.

  the group was a collection of whoops and hollers when the two of you came out of the room hand in hand. kaminari’s hair was a mess, his lips red and eyes a little dopey. you could only imagine you looked the same. you took a seat together back in the circle, ashido grinning devilishly. you knew it was her plan, but you would have to take her out for coffee as a thank you soon.

…

if you would like one, please select a prompt from here and send a character with any of the numbers.

blog.name: matchups-everywhere
blog.title: Matchups, imagines, and headcanons!
blog.description: [askbox:OPEN!] I'm bunny and I like My Hero Acadamia, Danganronpa, and Voltron. Rules

summary: Hi! Can I get a male BNHA matchup? I'm very cheerful and appear happy go lucky since I often smile. I can also get pretty loud...
question: Hi! Can I get a male BNHA matchup? I'm very cheerful and appear happy go lucky since I often smile. I can also get pretty loud when excited although it's usually not on purpose. However, I'm actually pretty introverted, always getting nervous about talking to new people. I usually keep to myself as a result. Still, I love making people smile/laugh. I love cats, sleeping, hugs, and playing video games. Also, I'm female, a redhead, 5'8, and have lots of freckles on my face haha
answer:
I match you with…

Shoto Todoroki!

He likes seeing you smile. Like a LOT. He can also appreciate how quiet and chill you can be. I bet that you’d definitely be able to make him smile/laugh! Shouto would really like to spend time just napping with you. He doesn’t really know anything about video games, but he’ll try for you! You two will probably own a cat together one day.


I hope you liked your matchup! - Mod Bunny

Requests are closed

blog.name: fourth-best-jeanist
blog.title: Fourth Best Jeanist
blog.description:
soo I’m gone on a trip out of wifi for two weeks (rip me) wish me luck friends o_o

Icon by @maplelemoncandy !

body:
Class 1a April fools headcanons

- Ochako, Sero and Tsu would team up in secret. In the middle of the night Ochako would make every piece of furniture in the common area float. Tsu would position all the furniture, and Sero would tape it all upside down on the roof. Nobody would suspect the three of them working together

- Iida would send out a mass text message saying “I hope you are all ready for the exam we have today. the exam that was definitely talked about. and is today. There is no reason why this would be a fake message because I am your class representative and you trust me.” Only a few students fall for it and are seen crying in the library an hour before class

- Kirishima and Denki decide the night before to dye their hair to each other’s colour, and styling it appropriately. Denki walks around all day with spiky red hair and Kirishima with an electric yellow mess on his head

- Momo decides to just. Make hundreds of tiny allmight figurines. Little allmights the size of your finger that she hides throughout ua. Everyone of course suspects Deku as being the cause of this, and he spends the day trying to collect as many as he can

- Todoroki tries to prank Izuku and his brain cell does its best. He makes Deku a cake that says “happy birthday izuku”, and then proceeds to explain to Deku that “it’s a prank. Because it’s not your birthday today. I pranked you Izuku” and Deku just blushes and laughs because todoroki is trying his best

- Little does he know that todoroki goes home after school to meet up with natsuo and fiyumi to absolutely WRECK the house with all might merch. Endeavour loses it. Half way through cooking dinner he realizes that all the dishes in the house have been replaced with “#1 hero allmight” dishes. All the clothes in his closet have been replaced with allmight onesies. His toothbrush says “I am here” on the handle. Todoroki and Natsuo sit in the corner of the room slurping their allmight sponsored noodles

- Denki’s prank is pretending to not know that it’s April fools day. He decided that this was the best way to freak the class out. Just pretending that he has no idea

blog.name: inexchangeforyoursoul
blog.title: A blog full of bunnies, sunshine and ripped heads.
blog.description:
Hello, I'm Kate but most people know me as Inex nowadays. Low-key pervert and rather tolerant 28-y-o aroace virgin; my birthday is 16th Feb if interested. No matter in what way I'm ruining your life, you are fucking welcome. (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧

Expect art, places and waves of my Holy Trinity aka Homestuck, Dark Souls and One Piece. Other regulars are Undertale, HeroAca and clods + some original content /see link below/. I also blog about everything that I find interesting or pretty- may include triggering (like, idk... gore) or angering (politics, mlp, you name it) stuff; otherwise this blog is pretty sfw and if you'd rather I tagged something, go ahead and ask and I'll do my best to remember! (´˙v˙`) NOTE: I've had enough of bots, so if you have a sfw blog follow me with that one because I WILL INSTABAN ANYONE WITH MORE THAN ONE IMAGE/PAGE OF THE NASTIES.

tags: a perfect copout bc he can die and get quote-unquote redemption aka have a normal-ass life from scratch

blog.name: matchups-everywhere
blog.title: Matchups, imagines, and headcanons!
blog.description: [askbox:OPEN!] I'm bunny and I like My Hero Acadamia, Danganronpa, and Voltron. Rules

summary: Hello! Can I please have a male match-up for BNHA and Voltron? I'm a 5'6 Gemini who can't see shit without glasses. I love...
question: Hello! Can I please have a male match-up for BNHA and Voltron? I'm a 5'6 Gemini who can't see shit without glasses. I love animals, and I have two leopard geckos at the moment; however, I will hopefully be getting a third! I'm a huge nerd, and although I'm usually pretty chilled out and nonchalant about things I have really bad social anxiety and the generalized anxiety. I do well in school, and I push myself very hard since I want to go into the medical l field. (1/2)
answer:
I consider myself to be smart and wise, as people often come to me for advice. I love water and fish, and I think things like dinosaurs and aliens are the coolest! I’m a horror movie fan, but I’m usually not interested in movies. I love collecting merch of my favourite characters, so my room is filled with posters and figurines! I like to sing and dance when I’m by myself, and I love to joke around with close friends. I’m a bit of a mess and I’m almost always having an internal crisis.Thank you!


Heyo!

For BNHA, I match you with…

Denki!

For Voltron, I match you with…

Lance!

SO, these two are also huge nerds, so you can  totally geek out with them! Denki loves to joke around with you, and Lance will talk to you for HOURS about aliens and dinosaurs. They’d both find talking to you very easy, so they’d also be the ones asking you for advice often. Lance is good at comforting you when you feel like a mess (he feels like one sometimes, as well). Denki definitely wants to hold your geckos.


I hope you liked your matchup! - Mod Bunny

Requests are closed

blog.name: mawritesbnha
blog.title: My Hero Academia imagines and headcanons
blog.description: Requests for hcs and imagines are OPEN. Match ups are CLOSED. Please read the rules before requesting. NOT SPOILER FREE. Header by lazulicons and icon by mha-icons.

summary: 4  for the fluff alphabet with Yaoyorozu?
question: 4  for the fluff alphabet with Yaoyorozu?
answer:
My precious girl! Hope this is alright and you’ll like it dearie

Smoochies from Ma!

It was almost christmas and you were spending the afternoon with Momo. Leisurely walking through the market, holding hand with your girlfriend, you gazed in wonder at every little trinket and hummed along every tune that the speakers would joyfully play.

As if things weren’t magical enough, snow gently started to fall. A few snowflakes got caught in Momo’s raven hair and you couldn’t help but stare. The rosy tint of her cheeks due to the cold weather, the fluffy scarf that almost covered that sweet and caring smile of her, the way she so elegantly and yet effortlessly carried herself… Everything screamed perfection.

“Have you always been this beautiful?” You softly whispered.

She turned to look at you, her eyes widening a little at your comment and her cheeks turning a brighter shade of red that only made her cuter.

“You’re flattering me…” She muttered, more surprised than truly embarrassed by your sudden compliment.

“I’m serious, I don’t know how I got so lucky…” You wondered out loud.

Gently, she brought a gloved hand to your cheek and gave you a tender smile as she answered :

“I’m the lucky one.”

tags: lol I rarely post on this blog
summary: Rereading the latest chapter and like...ooof I’m looking forward to seeing if Spinner does actually end up leaving the LoV....
body:
Rereading the latest chapter and like…ooof I’m looking forward to seeing if Spinner does actually end up leaving the LoV.

 Horikoshi-sensei be like ‘I’m going to create a villain based on the TMNT!’ …’I take it back, I can’t, I can’t do it…*cries in front of his shrine of TMNT comics, muttering cowabunga softly*’
